name: GuidedMeditation
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guided meditation
des:
You can always find the time for a guided meditation! The five minutes spent will pay back dividends to your long term mental health. To begin invoke the skill with 'Open Guided Meditation' and follow the prompts. 

If you like this skill and find it to be a useful addition to your mindfulness practice we would really appreciate if you drop us a review! Any suggestions, questions, or bug reports are welcome at support@stokedskills.com. We'd love to hear your feedback so we can continue to improve our products. Enjoy!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
